sentences.en: Coca - Cola had to adapt almost 300,000 vending machines to accept the new coins.
sentences.cn: 可口可乐 公司必须使将近三十万台自动贩卖机接受新货币.

sentences.en: Coca - cola is a soft drink.
sentences.cn: 可口可乐 是一种不含酒精的软性饮料.
可乐是一种不含酒精的软性饮料.

sentences.en: Cola nuts have caffeine in them.
I understand Coca-Cola are to be named as the new sponsors of the League Cup later this week.
sentences.cn: 我知道可口可乐公司将在本周晚些时候被指定为联赛杯的新赞助商。

sentences.en: Now there are cola drinks without caffeine.
sentences.cn: 现在也有不含咖啡因的可乐类饮料.

sentences.en: Oh, I'll bring some bottles of orange and coca - cola.
sentences.cn: 噢, 我带几瓶橙汁和可乐.

sentences.en: Pepsi - Cola and other cola every day.
sentences.cn: 百事可乐和其他可乐类饮料.

sentences.en: The coco - cola frothed as it was poured out.
sentences.cn: 可口可乐 倒出来时泛起泡沫.

sentences.en: The Cola flavor in the drinks comes from the cola nut.
sentences.cn: 饮料中的可乐味道来自可乐果.

sentences.en: The most effective new botanicals are extracts from cola nut and marine algae.
sentences.cn: 这种极其有效的新型植物制剂是从可乐果和海藻中提炼出来的。

sentences.en: There was a cola by the side of the house.
sentences.cn: 房子旁边有一棵可乐果树.

sentences.en: We've got tea, coffee, beer, coconut milk, orange juice and Coca Cola.
sentences.cn: 有茶, 咖啡, 啤酒, 椰汁, 桔汁和可乐.

sentences.en: When it comes to soft drinks Coca-Cola is the biggest selling brand name in Britain.
sentences.cn: 说到软饮料，可口可乐在英国是最大的畅销品牌。

words.tran_cn: 可乐；可乐树（其子含咖啡碱）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 可口可乐（美国饮料品牌）
